The following calculations are done by calling data stored in a neo4j graph database. To insert data in this database, first use `main_analysis.py` to generate a  please use the code `toDB.py` after changing the paths to the data you want to import. 
```{r, include FALSE}
library(RNeo4j)
graph=startGraph('http://localhost:7474/db/data', username='neo4j', password='admin')
query='
MATCH (a:Algorithm)
RETURN a.Name'
a<-cypher(graph, query)#list of algorithms names
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
graph=startGraph('http://localhost:7474/db/data', username='neo4j', password='admin')
query='
MATCH (a:Algorithm)
WHERE a.Name=namealg1
MATCH (b)<-[s:ISANEVALOF]-(c)-[:WASEVALWITH]->(a)
AND (t)<-[r:SAW]-(b)
RETURN a.Name, c.tNoisemasked, c.tNoise, s.tEval, s.tEvalmasked, t.Name, r.trainLength, r.Track
'
q<-cypher(graph,query,namealg1=a[0])#takes the info of each MicMes for one algorithm
```
